quest_giver.initial_greeting: Please, you must help us! Monsters have appeared in the forest!
quest_giver.explain_monsters: They're attacking anyone who enters. We need someone brave to clear them out. Will you help?
quest_giver.thank_you: Thank you so much! Please be careful out there. The monsters are very dangerous.
quest_giver.disappointed: Oh... I understand. I hope someone else can help us...
quest_giver.quest_in_progress: Have you cleared the forest yet? Please hurry, people are getting worried!
quest_giver.quest_complete_thanks: You did it! The forest is safe again! Here, take this reward as thanks for your bravery.

player.not_interested: Sorry, I'm too busy right now.
player.accept_quest: I'll help you clear the forest.
player.goodbye: I have to go now. Goodbye.
player.youre_welcome: You're welcome. Glad I could help.
player.still_working: I'm still working on it. Don't worry!
player.buy_sword_no_money: I'd like to buy that sword.
player.sorry: Sorry, I don't have enough gold.
player.tell_history: Tell me about the village history.

merchant.greeting: Welcome to my shop! I have the finest weapons and armor in the land. What can I get for you?
merchant.weapons_display: Ah, interested in weapons? I have a fine Iron Sword for 100 gold. Strong and reliable!
merchant.armor_display: Armor, you say? I'm afraid I'm out of stock right now. Check back later!
merchant.sword_purchased: Excellent choice! This Iron Sword will serve you well. Anything else?
merchant.not_enough_gold: That'll be 100 gold coins. I'm afraid you don't have enough.
merchant.need_key: I can't talk right now. Come back when you have the blacksmith's key.

elder.greeting: Welcome, traveler. What brings you to our humble village?
elder.identity: I am the village elder. I've lived here for over 50 years and watched this place grow from a small settlement to the community you see today.
elder.history: This village was founded long ago by brave pioneers seeking a better life. The forest you see was once filled with ancient magic, but those days are long gone. Or so we thought...
